1.3.name: wordpress/automated-editor
1.3.description:
Automated Editor add's powerful functionality to your WordPress blog, allowing you to automate editing. Gain complete control of your content and leverage the power of automation to fix, upgrade and supplement your valuable content. Automated editor is the single most powerful replacement for traditional search & replace plugins available. If you wan't to edit right, edit with this, it will replace strings, remove strings, move posts, add to posts, tag posts, untag posts and much more, automatically, working on rules you set up!

Limited offer @ $35 Upgrade to Ultra Pro Version

Video Guides | Screenshots | Compatible With|
